name: Red

hints.none:
Tulips surround me
Originally a pump
Now just a landmark
hints.small: There are two windmills in the park. They were built to pump water for irrigating the park. But only one has a tulip garden!
hints.big: If you're still stuck the sticker may be missing. It should be on a bench by the Dutch Windmill.
